owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

sweep(address,address).details: Only owner can call this to prevent unauthorized token extraction

params.to: Address to send the swept tokens to
params.token: Address of the token to sweep

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

burnPosition(uint256).notice: Burn an NFT position (must have 0 liquidity)

calculateProportionalAmounts(uint256,uin.notice: Calculate proportional amounts for a given liquidity

collectFees(uint256,address).notice: Collect fees and tokens from a position

increaseLiquidity(uint256,uint256,uint25.notice: Increase liquidity in an existing position

mintPosition(address,address,uint24,int2.notice: Mint a new Uniswap V3 position

mintPositionWithRefund(address,address,u.notice: Mint a new Uniswap V3 position and refund unused tokens to a recipient

sweep(address,address).notice: Sweep unused tokens from the adapter to recover stuck funds
